1.title: Hasn't Hit Me Yet

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

1.plot: Mario Lopez and girlfriend Courtney Mazza are three months away from parenthood! But the idea of fatherhood hasn't quite hit Mario yet.

2.title: The Art of Compromise

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

2.plot: Mario is all about family so he takes a break from his crazy work schedule to bring his and Courtney's families on a vacation to Mexico.

3.title: Mario's Juggling Act

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

3.plot: Mario brings Courtney and friends to the Del Mar racetrack where he must work for Extra, but he hopes to have some fun while he's there. His plan doesn't go over all that gracefully.

4.title: When Is Enough, Enough?

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

4.plot: After Courtney winds up in the hospital, the eager parents find out that they can't have sex until her condition is cleared up. Courtney also decides she must lay down the law about Mario's work priorities needing to shift.

5.title: Courtney's Made the Switch

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

5.plot: Courtney has gone from being the poster child for the perfect pregnant woman with no ill effects to a hormonal wreck. As a way to blow off steam Mario meets up with the guys and together they come up with a way to help Courtney.

6.title: What Kind of Dad Will I Be?

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

6.plot: Mario and Courtney go to the Dr. for another check up and happily find out they can have sex again! This time the doctor introduces them to certain courses that new parents must take before the baby is born.

7.title: To Be There

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

7.plot: Once again Mario is torn away from a VERY pregnant Courtney for work purposes. It's the day before the Emmy's and tension around Extra is thick. Will Mario find the balance between tending to his wife and his very busy career?

8.title: Vegas Baby!

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

8.plot: Mario heads to Vegas with his boys to present at a big boxing event. Courtney is left behind again but this time it's a week from her due date and she can pop at any moment!

9.title: It's a...

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

9.plot: While Mario is in Vegas for work, Mazza is in the hospital and finds out she is going into early labor. Mario has little time before missing the last flight out of Vegas. Will Mario make it in time for the birth of his baby?

10.title: Bringing Home Baby Gia

episode of.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (TV Series 2010–2011)

10.plot: Mario and Courtney bring baby Gia home from the hospital and just when Mario starts to relax he finds out Extra might be moving to NY. Mario is left wondering if he should uproot his family to NY or possibly lose his job.

imdb.title: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby
akas: Mario Lopez: Saved by the Baby (United States)
plot: Mario Lopez lives the life of the ultimate bachelor. Always surrounded by the most beautiful women at the hottest events. But he's about to swap parties for parenthood because Mario and his girlfriend--Courtney Mazza--are having a baby!
